text: James Firman Daly (October 23, 1918 - July 3, 1978) was an American movie, television, stage, radio, and voice actor who is known for his role as Paul Lochner in Medical Center. He won an Emmy Award in 1966. Daly was born on October 23, 1918 in Wisconsin Rapids, Wisconsin. He studied at Cornell College. He was married to Hope Newall from 1942 until they divorced in 1965. They had 4 children, including Tim Daly and Tyne Daly. Daly died on July 3, 1978 in Nyack, New York from heart failure, aged 59. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1918 births Category:1978 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American radio actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Wisconsin Category:Emmy Award winning actors
title: James Daly
